awd_titl_txt: Massively Parallel Algorithms for Financial Modeling Under  Uncertainty
awd_abstract_narration: This project deals with the design, analysis and implementation                 of massively parallel algorithms for a broad class of stochastic                programming problems.  The developed algorithms will be used to                 solve models that arise in mortgage-based financing in the                      banking industry, asset/liability management for insurance and                  pension fund companies, hydroelectric power scheduling and                      transportation planning.  The Union Bank of Switzerland is                      cosponsoring the project.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
